Summary: It was green iridecent in color and moved from over treetop to earth slow then fast .
divs: sighting detailsi was going to a resturant called twist on the east side of providence and as i pulled up and parked ii was facing east. it was dark (21:00 hrs) i looked up at the level of the visor in the car (no lights in car were on) and i observed above tree top level (not in front of trees) a greenish iridecent glowing thing (egg shapped). it moved slow from way above tree top level to then a fast pace then slow and vanished. it appeared to move at a 70 degree angle. it was glowing in center, appeared to move, had a strange irridecent stuff on outside area of it. it had a size of that of about a quarter of what one would see if it you looked at a full moon high in the horizon. i did not think much about this until i mentioned this to my attorny and friend that lives in jamestown. his wife observed the same thing and me. i do know exactly where i was parked last night and am going to take a picture from that vantage point in the daylight hours. i will also take a few of the spot i was parked in also. also, i do not drink, smoke nor do any drugs, nor was i on any otc or prescrition medications. please get back to me with info on what it was??? contact me via my cell phone {pid} and via email: {pid} {cms\jat\pid} text moved to narrative
